document.full_text: a decades-long relationship between boston's huntington theater company and stanford and norma jean calderwood has yielded a $10 million gift to the endowment of the theater, its leaders announced on thursday.
document.title: boston's huntington theater receives $10 million gift
lines_and_colors: a decades-long relationship between boston's huntington theater company and stanford and norma jean calderwood has yielded a $10 million gift to the endowment of the theater, its leaders announced on thursday.
